about_the_game:
The Top Class HDH is a perfect companion for every trip. From short day trips to long journeys, this versatile coach has the right equipment for every occasion. Thanks to its different lengths and equipment options, it can be individually adapted to the needs of its passengers.
It also impresses with its luxurious interior. The comfortable seats and the impressive panoramic glass roof offer every passenger first-class comfort.

Variants included:

  • S515
    • Standard
    • Comfort
  • S516
    • Standard
    • Comfort
  • S517
    • Standard
    • Comfort
detailed_description:
DLC for Fernbus Sim + Tourist Bus Sim

By purchasing this DLC you will also receive Tourist Bus Simulator - Top Class HDH


About the Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4460
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 950 or Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Specifications may change during development.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 9700K
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce RTX 2060 or Radeon RX 5600XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Specifications may change during development. Installation on a SDD recommended.

short_description: The perfect companion for every trip! Thanks to its different lengths and equipment options, it can be individually adapted to the needs of its passengers.
supported_languages:
English, German*, French, Polish, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Turkish, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Hungarian, Swedish, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Finnish, Dutch, Arabic
*languages with full audio support
